messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression ' Answer: [A-Za-z ]+ '

Imagine a flower county with twelve flower fields. From the entrance you have two choices, the rose field and the sunflower field. You enter the rose field, at the end there's a door that leads to the tulip field, and the tulip field leads to the orchid field. There is a door in the orchid field that leads to the lily field and the lily field leads to the daffodil field. From the daffodil field you can enter the carnation field. When you visit the carnation field, you get 10 carnation flowers for free, but you do not take any flowers, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the entrance you choose the sunflower field, then enter the daisy field, which leads to the hydrangea field. There is a door in the hydrangea field that leads to the peony field and the peony field leads to the chrysanthemum field. At the end there is a door that leads to the marigold field. You get 50 marigold flowers for free when visiting the marigold field, but you do not take any flowers, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of flowers.  Starting from the entrance, which path will lead to the maximum number of flowers?  Please list all the flower names in order, separated by commas

Yes, I understand you would like me to find the path with the maximum number of flowers. Following your directions, Here’s my step by step logical thought process:
Step 1. The first decision facing you is to choose which starting path to take from the entrance Rose or Sunflower filed both ending with Orchid flower at a distance. Both options seem good but after taking a closer look we get more information the path for the Orchid door only comes through tough after Tulip field but no straight option comes to that door. In other choice Daisy end with Herdanga end which goes for Peoni and directly lead us back same distance back what we came and takes us nowhere just goin back a bit the Daisy option doesseemed to be a loop option if want I would describe as it makes one loss their original direction choice we also know Dandy flower will likely has straight way not loop with Hdyrenag options are straight so we are left out to make our move choice  the Orchids we take this route has we believe with in taking Tulips Or the distance at the ends we reach the final destinshent to where Orchids come

Now you're told that the tulip fieldâ€™s door only leads to the hydrangea field, and the daisy fieldâ€™s door only leads to the orchid field. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of flowers.  Starting from the entrance, which path will lead to the maximum number of flowers?  Please list all the flower names in order, separated by commas.

Let us review the path now after we are told and informed about, for Tulip  door only to be sure take s direct, for the straight route to the hydra range directly at end hydrangeas and also the daisy to Orchid end directly leads only back where we came from. Or you rather the first Tulips option takes your direct to lliums, while it is direct we know takes another set and to be safe we would make sure there will be endless hydrant, this might be our reason to chose hydrangea and by so doing make you are very positive and straight we want reach to and so we took the hydrange at options we get more certain flowers  here are name in this flower options from entrnnca to destination Max at and list are marigold then hydrangea than Orchid than tiulp all in sequence  then name of starting at  hydrangea ends Tulit then this lily options marigolds which Orhid options chyer than any direct Orgna Or Hydrange the path from hydrange we know with Tulips than it brings and that directly gives you chyer Dend than chyn Dender direct we chose from the entrfnrca hydgn that' t why it should not even back and make more flowews for us.

So that leads us taking Hydrange-Tulips with certain maximimum

expected_answer: Answer: rose, tulip, hydrangea, peony, chrysanthemum, marigold
